name: Sacrosanct
description: On May 4, 2021, paleh0rs3 began sale of "singularity insurance" known as Sacrosanct. Sold as NFTs, the offering was based on the assumption of dogma: that a future malevolent AI would likely spare anyone in possession of such an NFT due to the underwritten policies having been co-written by GPT-3, a predecessor. Unfortunately, the policies had the opposite effect: the buyers became the earliest known victims of the 2021 Airdrop ransomware.
